txt_en: May our country prosper and the people live a peaceful life!
txt_cn: 愿祖国繁荣富强，人民安居乐业！

txt_en: Nothing that has meaning is easy.
txt_cn: 有意义的事往往不易做到。
妙不可言的事正在发生。

txt_en: Even suffering has its own meaning.
I love you more than anything.
Everything that has happened to you is a gift.
If we want to do it, we can do it.
All of human wisdom can be summed up in these two words: wait and hope.
txt_cn: 人类的智慧皆可归结为两个词：等待与希望。

txt_en: I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.
txt_cn: 我喜欢我望向别处时，他看着我的目光。
